page.title: 14GENERAL MERCHANTS-SHOPS
page.content: In our area there are{two shops;}one down at the{pier-head}in Kettletoft 'Village' and the other in the centre of the island, in the region called {Broughston.}The one at Kettletoft is a much larger building and also supplies a mobile shop.{Both}are{general {stores:-}i.e. both sell a variety of goods ranging from groceries to clothing to needles and thread etc. Both also provide petrol pump facilities. The people on the island do not necessarily go to the shop nearest to them: they are more likely to go to the shop they prefer.
